Arizona Winter School 2011: Stark-Heegner points

The next Arizona Winter School will be held from March 12-16, 2011, at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Click here to register and/or apply for funding
    Registration is open to all. The application deadline for students seeking funding or wishing to participate in a student project is January 10, 2011. The project descriptions should be available in mid-December.
  • Schedule and other important information.
  • Organizers
    • Main program: Matt Papanikolas, Dinesh Thakur
    • Other: Rachel Pries, Fernando Rodriguez-Villegas, and David Savitt
  • Wiki

Speakers

  • Henri Darmon and Victor Rotger, Stark-Heegner points
  • Samit Dasgupta and Matthew Greenberg, The rank one abelian Stark conjecture
  • Robert Pollack and Glenn Stevens, Overconvergent modular symbols
  • Kartik Prasanna, Periods and special values of L-functions
